The latest features of the Betway app makes it a true leader in its category. This app can be downloaded on any device, is one of the most flexible betting apps available for sports betting. With odds offered on more than 15,000 betting markets, Betway also offers pre-match and in-play offers.

 

With the mobile Betway app, punters now have the opportunity to bet on anything from the ever-popular football matches to ice hockey, and American football.

Betway has increasingly gained respect as bookmakers and are one of the most respected mobile betting apps in the business right now.

How has Betway Mobile been enhanced?

Betway is the easy to access betting app that has a high-quality design for an aesthetically pleasing betting experience, today and always.

The ultimate user-friendly experience

Betway has worked hard at making enhancements to continue to improve its app and it is easier than ever to navigate. This allows users to jump between matches of different events and to take advantage of all the pre-match and in-play events on offer.

Faster loading and less data usage

With a few taps, the punter can place single bets or accumulators and the site remains stable throughout. Its new enhanced features make it smooth and intuitive while it also allows users to live stream major sporting events from their mobile devices. All this is accomplished by using less data and it is faster than ever.

Specially developed for smartphones

The ultra-modern design of the app for smartphones, designed to the standards of how modern bookmakers present their odds today, is pleasing to the eyes and offers one of the most reliable and easy ways to navigate through everything from promotions to withdrawals.

Notifications about fixtures and promotions

You can choose what notifications you want to receive and the app is also designed to be intuitive so that its user can optimally enjoy all that it offers.

Private and protected information

Every user of the mobile app is assured that their personal information, banking details, and account balance are secure as Betway conforms to all the directives regarding privacy and security.

Payments and withdrawals

Stability, reliability, and safety characterize the Betway app at every level, but for most punter, their concerns are usually based around the payment and withdrawal methods. With Betway there are a number of payment and withdrawal options available for its users and all problems are instantly addressed through Betway Customer Support 24/7 directly from the mobile app, by email or live chat, as preferred by the user.

How to download the Betway App?

For both Android and iPhone device users, the Betway app can be downloaded from the official site, but Android users will first have to follow the instructions on how to prepare their phones for the download.

Download on Android

From settings on the Android device, the user can tap on security. They then need to click on “Allow Unknown Sources” in the Device Administration. When the box appears the user needs to click “OK” then go back to the webpage, where they can then click on “Download the Android App”. When the box appears they need to tap “OK” and the app will begin the download. While downloading in the notifications at the bottom of the screen they will be able to see the progress. As soon as the app has been downloaded they can click “Install” and once the installation is complete they can click “Open” and then sign up or log in.

Download on iPhone

IPhone users will be redirected to the iTunes Store once they have clicked onto the Download on App Store icon from the web page. The app will be directly downloaded onto their phone where they will be able to log in with their existing username and password.
